Ada Turnamen Call of Duty Mobile Berhadiah Ratusan Juta Rupiah
04 Nov 2019, 16:17 by Aisyah Kamaliah, Aisyah Kamaliah - detikInet


Call of Duty Mobile. (Foto: detikINET/Aisyah Kamaliah)

Jakarta - Call of Duty Mobile baru dirilis 1 Oktober 2019. Meski masih baru dirilis, jumlah unduhannya sudah mencapai 1 juta. Hal tersebut membuat Garena pede untuk menggelar perlombaan turnamen offline Call of Duty Mobile."Kita sempat buat turnamen online Warfare tapi antusiasmenya nggak nyangka, limit 64 tim lebih dari 500 tim yang akhirnya mendaftar. Di tim ini banyak yang tim besar yang ikut seperti Evos," ujar Edmundo Swidoyono, Produce Call of Duty Mobile Garena, di sela konferensi pers di Jakarta, Senin (4/11/2019).


Call of Duty Mobile. Foto: detikINET/Aisyah Kamaliah

"Melihat antusiasme dan permintaan user dan komunitas, kami akhirnya memutuskan melanjutkan ke major series," sambungnya.Buat para Soldiers--sebutan pemain CoD Mobile--yang ingin membuktikan kemampuannya, silakan mendaftar pada tanggal 4-5 November 2019. Tahap kedua akan dilakukan secara online dan melalui dua fase, fase pertama 12-16 November dan kedua 19-23 November 2019."Jangan sampai ketinggalan daftarkan timnya. Ada yang bikin tim CoD Mobile sebelum gamenya rilis," ujar Edmundo menjelaskan."Ke depannya kita akan berinovasi memberi mode baru jadi nggak cuma dari sisi e-sportnya tapi game-nya itu sendiri," ujarnya.Nantinya, akan disaring total 4 tim (masing-masing dua tim dari tiap fase) yang akan melanjutkan pertandingan ke tahap final major series 14 Desember 2019. Hadiah yang dijanjikan pun mencapai hadiah total Rp 110 juta, wow! Yakin nggak mau daftar nih, detikers? There is a Call of Duty Mobile Tournament with Hundreds of Million Rupiah Prizes
Nov 04 2019, 16:17 by Aisyah Kamaliah, Aisyah Kamaliah - detikInet


Call of Duty Mobile. (Photo: detikINET / Aisyah Kamaliah)

Jakarta - Call of Duty Mobile was only released on October 1, 2019. Although it is still newly released, the number of downloads has reached 1 million. This makes Garena confident to hold an offline Call of Duty Mobile tournament. "We had a chance to create a Warfare online tournament but the enthusiasm was unexpected, the limit of 64 teams of more than 500 teams that finally registered. In this team there were many big teams who participated like Evos, "said Edmundo Swidoyono, Produce Call of Duty Mobile Garena, on the sidelines of a press conference in Jakarta, Monday (11/04/2019).


Call of Duty Mobile. Photo: detikINET / Aisyah Kamaliah

"Seeing the enthusiasm and requests of users and the community, we finally decided to continue to the major series," he continued. For Soldiers - as CoD Mobile players - who want to prove their abilities, please register on 4-5 November 2019. The second stage will be carried out online and through two phases, the first phase November 12-16 and the second November 19-23 2019. "Don't miss the list of teams. There is something that makes the CoD Mobile team before the game is released," Edmundo explained. "In the future we will innovate to give "The new mode is not only from the e-sport side but the game itself," he said. Later, a total of 4 teams (each of two teams from each phase) will be screened to continue the match to the final stage of the major series on December 14, 2019. The promised prize reached a total prize of Rp 110 million, wow! Are you sure you don't want to register, detikers?
